thread.section_title: AMIClubwear.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMIClubwear.com | www.amiclubwear.com
thread.title: arielle shepard

author: arielle shepard
title: arielle shepard
text: I'm 5'5", 130lbs, 27" waist and 34DDD and ordered the "sexy white pleated v cut strapless aline party dress" in a size M for my bach party. I'm on the cusp of S-M, typically M because of larger bust. I didn't even fill the top half out, seriously, worst quality and nothing like the picture. The whole dress looks like a cheap sheet of fabric and fit nothing like on the model I wouldn't even exchange this for a smaller size or different dress. Disappointed in what they advertise vs what you receive!
